external_games.name: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns

name: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns
storyline:
The knights always appear when evil tries to harm the world, the zodiac knights come to the GameBoy Color in this fan made with love for all the fans.

Relive your childhood imagining what it would have been like to have a title like this in your time.
summary: Knights of the Zodiac: The Phoenix Returns is a fan game created for the Game Boy Color that retraces the beginning of the animation (from the moment where Seiya gets his armor) and follows the battle against Ikki.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: El regreso del Fénix - Los Caballeros del Zodiaco GBC FREE FANGAME
